pr_title: Add the rest of the fields to UserResourceBean.

timeline.message: Add the rest of the fields to UserResourceBean.

timeline.bodyText: I think the current app assumes it to be "resources" (and "report").
timeline.author: kuoyuchi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,13 +21,25 @@
 @Getter
 public class UserResourceBean {
   public enum Type {
-	  @JsonProperty("report")
-	  PERSONALIZED_REPORT,
-	  @JsonProperty("resource")
-	  INSTITUTION_RESOURCE
+    @JsonProperty("report")
+    PERSONALIZED_REPORT,
+    @JsonProperty("resource")

timeline.bodyText: We might need to set this field to different integers in the response. It seems that at least the iOS app cares about the presence of this field.
timeline.author: kuoyuchi

replies.bodyText: Okay, I will address this in another PR.
replies.author: karepker

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure if this field matters on app but we might need to set it to "All".
timeline.author: kuoyuchi

timeline.message: Change string representation of user resources to "resources".
